about_the_game:
In a future where humanity has mastered space travel, the universe is your playground - and your battleground. As the commander of a state-of-the-art space station mining facility, your mission is twofold: explore the cosmos to extract precious ORE from distant asteroid belts, and protect your base from relentless enemies determined to sabotage your operations.

Navigate treacherous space environments, upgrade your mining equipment, and fortify your station's defenses to withstand waves of hostile forces. With strategic planning and quick reflexes, you must manage your resources wisely and expand your station's capabilities.

Can you become the ultimate space mining tycoon? Are you ready to harness the riches of the universe and defend your claim against all odds?

What you can expect from this game

  • Many hours of fun gameplay with increasing difficulties

  • Upgrades and customizations to enhance the gaming experience

  • Graphics that are recognizable and understandable

What you cannot expect from this game

  • Tripple-A graphics and sound engineering. I am an indie developer and I love to make games that have fun gameplay and hours of entertainment, but I am NOT an artist and can't draw even if my life depended on it. You have been warned!

name: Cosmic Stronghold

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 550 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Cosmic Stronghold is a mix of the genres RTS and Tower Defense. Your primary goal is to keep your space station alive for as long as possible, so that it can harvest the nearby mines for precious mineral ores. You will be faced with waves of enemies, getting stronger and stronger for each wave.
supported_languages: English, Danish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Traditional Chinese
